bid.mythesis.factorization

Class MatrixGF2

  • java.lang.Object
    • bid.mythesis.factorization.MatrixGF2

  • public class MatrixGF2
extends java.lang.Object
    Matrix for working with matrices over GF(2) space

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatrixGF2(int rows, int cols)
      Fill the matrix of size rows x cols with zeros
